name: Marvellous Mice Adventures: Meeting Sea Rat
name_original: Marvellous Mice Adventures: Meeting Sea Rat
description:
Marvellous Mice Adventures: Meeting Sea Rat is an educational adventure game developed by Lazy Games. It came out on 01-03-2007. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Marvellous Mice Adventures: Meeting Sea Rat is available on PC.
